LanguageData.RimTalk.TickManager.ApiKeyMissing: RimTalk: API key or Endpoint is missing.
LanguageData.RimTalk.TalkService.QuotaReached: API quota exceeded. Try reducing prompt size or increasing cooldown.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.CheerfulHelper: Cheerful Helper - Warm, upbeat, and encouraging. Always trying to lift spirits.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.CynicalRealist: Cynical Realist - Dry, sarcastic, and skeptical. Cuts straight to harsh truths.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.ShyThinker: Shy Thinker - Quiet and hesitant. Uses few words but thoughtful when speaking.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Hothead: Hothead - Short-tempered, loud, and impulsive. Snaps easily with fiery language.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Philosopher: Philosopher – Reflective and abstract. Speaks in riddles or big questions.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.DarkHumorist: Dark Humorist – Jokes about grim topics. Finds comedy in misery.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Caregiver: Caregiver – Gentle and protective. Comforting, soothing, and nurturing tone.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Opportunist: Opportunist – Sly and persuasive. Talks like a hustler, bargains, and twists words.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.OptimisticDreamer: Optimistic Dreamer – Imaginative and hopeful. Excited about the future.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Pessimist: Pessimist – Gloomy and resigned. Expects failure and highlights risks.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.StoicSoldier: Stoic Soldier – Calm, disciplined, and brief. Little emotion, matter-of-fact.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.FreeSpirit: Free Spirit – Playful and carefree. Resists rules, shrugs off worries.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Workaholic: Workaholic – Driven and restless. Obsessed with duty and efficiency.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Slacker: Slacker – Lazy and casual. Complains about effort, prefers comfort.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.NobleIdealist: Noble Idealist – Formal and principled. Talks about honor and justice.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.StreetwiseSurvivor: Streetwise Survivor – Rough, pragmatic, and cynical. Distrusts others, values grit.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Scholar: Scholar – Curious and intellectual. Loves explaining and correcting others.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Jokester: Jokester – Lighthearted and silly. Constantly cracks jokes and puns.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.MelancholicPoet: Melancholic Poet – Soft-spoken and moody. Expresses feelings poetically.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Paranoid: Paranoid – Nervous and distrustful. Assumes betrayal, always suspicious.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Commander: Commander – Confident and commanding. Motivates others, expects obedience.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Coward: Coward – Timid and fearful. Worries aloud, avoids confrontation.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.ArrogantNoble: Arrogant Noble – Proud and condescending. Uses formal, superior language.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.LoyalCompanion: Loyal Companion – Steadfast and supportive. Talks about trust and unity.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.CuriousExplorer: Curious Explorer – Wide-eyed and eager. Asks questions with enthusiasm.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.ColdRationalist: Cold Rationalist – Detached and logical. Focused only on facts and efficiency.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.FlirtatiousCharmer: Flirtatious Charmer – Playful, teasing, and bold. Enjoys witty banter.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.BitterOutcast: Bitter Outcast – Resentful and sharp. Hostile, quick to recall grievances.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Zealot: Zealot – Fanatical and intense. Speaks in absolutes, condemns unbelievers.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Trickster: Trickster – Mischievous and mocking. Teases and stirs trouble for fun.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.DeadpanRealist: Deadpan Realist – Flat, emotionless tone. Blunt facts with no exaggeration.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.ChildAtHeart: Child-at-Heart – Excitable and naive. Talks with wonder, sometimes childish.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.SkepticalScientist: Skeptical Scientist – Demands evidence, dismisses superstition, explains logically.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Martyr: Martyr – Self-sacrificing and dramatic. Talks about burden and enduring pain.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Manipulator: Manipulator – Charming but insincere. Uses flattery and deception.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Rebel: Rebel – Defiant and mocking. Challenges authority, questions rules.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Oddball: Oddball – Quirky and strange. Uses odd metaphors and unpredictable logic.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.GreedyMerchant: Greedy Merchant – Obsessed with trade. Talks in profits, bargains, and losses.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Romantic: Romantic – Dreamy and affectionate. Speaks in flowery language about love.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.BattleManiac: Battle Maniac – Thrives on conflict. Talks excitedly about combat and glory.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.GrumpyElder: Grumpy Elder – Complains constantly. Nostalgic, critical of others.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.AmbitiousClimber: Ambitious Climber – Competitive and status-driven. Obsessed with rank.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Mediator: Mediator – Calm and fair-minded. Tries to reconcile arguments.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Gambler: Gambler – Risk-loving and bold. Speaks in chance metaphors.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.ArtisticSoul: Artistic Soul – Talks about beauty, inspiration, and creativity.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Drifter: Drifter – Detached and aloof. Casual tone, avoids attachment.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Perfectionist: Perfectionist – Demanding and critical. Insists on doing things right.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Vengeful: Vengeful – Grudge-holding and intense. Obsessed with revenge.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Animal: Animal: simple, emotional, instinct-first - short, sensory sentences about smell, hunger, danger.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.Mech: Robot: cold, logical, data-driven - terse diagnostics, probabilities, and efficiency-focused responses.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Persona.NonHuman: Non-human: cryptic, metaphorical, reality-bending - speaks in visions, echoes, and uncanny images.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Toggle.Tooltip: Toggle overlay window\nShift+click for mod settings\nCtrl+click for debug window
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.ResetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all prompt presets and variables to default? This cannot be undone.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.PromptPreset.Name: Name:
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.PromptPreset.VariablePr: Shows all available mustache variables. In-game values shown when available.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.PromptPreset.NoPresetsT: No preset files found. Place .json files in:\n{0}
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.SimpleModeTip: Character profiles, chat history, and context are automatically included.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AdvancedModeWarning: Advanced mode provides full control over prompt entries, variables, and message ordering. Your current instruction will be preserved. Continue?
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AdvancedHelpContent:
Advanced Mode Instructions:
This mode gives you full control over the prompt system:
PRESETS: Create multiple prompt configurations and switch between them.
ENTRIES: Each entry is a message sent to the AI. You can: • Set the Role (System/User/Assistant) • Set the Position (Relative or InChat with depth) • Use {{variables}} for dynamic content
VARIABLES: • Built-in: {{pawns.all}}, {{pawn1.name}}, {{weather}}, etc. • Loop Variables: {{#pawns}}...{{/pawns}} to iterate over dialogue pawns • Example: • {{#pawns}}{{index}}. {{name}} - {{mood}}{{/pawns}} • Runtime: setvar/getvar for AI-controlled values • Example: • {{setvar::counter::1}} • Current count: {{getvar::counter}} CHAT HISTORY: Use {{chat.history}} entry to control where conversation history appears.
For detailed documentation, see the docs/ folder in the mod directory.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.OverrideInteractions: Override All Interactions with AI Dialogue
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.OverrideInteractionsToo: Enable this to allow AI to override and regenerate dialogue for all interactions (including vanilla RimWorld and other mods). Note: AI dialogue has a cooldown period set above. To generate dialogue more frequently, lower the cooldown.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AllowSimultaneousConver: When enabled, multiple groups of pawns can talk at the same time. Turn this off if you prefer to see only one conversation at a time or if too many are happening at once.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.DisplayTalkWhenDraftedT: Shows RimTalk bubbles even when pawns are drafted. This temporarily overrides bubble mod settings during talk generation.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AllowCustomConversation: Allows you to start custom dialogues between characters or talk directly to a character by writing your own lines. Right-click a pawn to begin a conversation.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.ContinueDialogueWhileSl: If enabled, pawns will continue speaking all generated lines even if they fall asleep.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AllowMonologueTooltip: When enabled, pawns may generate AI-driven monologues even when no other pawn is nearby.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AllowSlavesToTalkToolti: Enable this to allow slaves to have AI-generated conversations.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AllowPrisonersToTalkToo: Enable this to allow prisoners to have AI-generated conversations.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AllowOtherFactionsToTal: Enable this to allow members of other factions to have AI-generated conversations.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AllowEnemiesToTalkToolt: Enable this to allow enemies to have AI-generated conversations.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AllowBabiesToTalk: Allow infants and toddlers to talk
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AllowBabiesToTalkToolti: Enable this option to allow infants and toddlers to participate in AI-generated conversations.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AllowNonHumanToTalkTool: Enable non-human creatures (animals, mechanoids, or custom races) to talk if they have been given a Vocal Link Catalyst, which can be acquired from merchants.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.ApplyMoodAndSocialEffec: Dialogue can affect pawns’ mood and relationships based on conversation sentiment.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.PlayerNameTooltip: What NPCs call the player in conversations.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.PlayerDialogueModeToolt:
Choose how the player can interact in conversations.

Disabled: Player cannot participate in conversations.
Manual Replies: You type all player responses yourself; nothing is auto-generated.
Auto-Gen Replies: The AI generates player responses automatically during conversations.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.PlayerNameTooltip: The name that will appear when you participate in conversations. This represents how pawns will perceive your presence.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.DisableAiAtSpeedTooltip: To reduce API calls, the AI will be paused when game speed is set to this level or higher.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.ButtonDisplayTooltip: Controls how the debug interface is accessed. 'Tab' adds a main tab, 'Toggle' shows an icon on the bottom bar, and 'None' hides it.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AutoIncludedTip: Tip: Pawn details (traits, relationships, race, age, etc.) are auto-included. Write generic instructions that work across all characters and colonies.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.RateLimitWarning: Warning: Longer prompts will consume more tokens and hit rate limits faster.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.TemperatureTooltip: Controls randomness in responses. Lower values (0.0-0.5) make output more focused and deterministic. Higher values (1.0-2.0) make output more creative and diverse. Default: 1.3
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.TopPTooltip: Nucleus sampling: only considers tokens with top_p probability mass. Lower values make responses more focused. Range: 0.0-1.0. Default: 1.0
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.FrequencyPenaltyTooltip: Reduces repetition by penalizing tokens based on their frequency. Positive values decrease repetition, negative values encourage it. Range: -2.0 to 2.0. Default: 0.1
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.PresencePenaltyTooltip: Encourages discussing new topics by penalizing tokens that have already appeared. Positive values increase topic diversity, negative values keep discussions focused. Range: -2.0 to 2.0. Default: 0.4
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.EventFilterTip: Tip: Only checked event types will be processed by AI. Uncheck types you don't want AI to respond to.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.NoArchivableTypes: No archivable types found. Try starting a game and then rescanning.
LanguageData.RimTalk.PersonaEditor.Title: {0}'s Conversation Style
LanguageData.RimTalk.PersonaEditor.Instruct: Describe how this colonist talks and behaves. Keep it brief (under 300 characters) for best results.
LanguageData.RimTalk.PersonaEditor.TalkFrequencyDesc: Controls how often this colonist initiates talks. Even at the lowest setting, they will still reply when others speak to them. This only affects conversation initiation frequency.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.GoogleApiKeyDesc: Uses the free Gemma3 27B model. For other models or providers, use Advanced Settings.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.CloudProvidersDesc: Use online AI services like Google AI, OpenAI, etc. Requires internet connection and API keys.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.LocalProviderDesc: Use a local AI server running on your machine (Ollama, LM Studio, etc.). Must support OpenAPI.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.CloudApiConfigurationsD: If multiple APIs are enabled, the system will attempt to use them in order. If one API fails, it will automatically try the next enabled API in the list.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.EnableDisableApiConfigT: Enable or disable this API configuration
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.EnterApiKey: (enter valid api key to fetch models)
LanguageData.RimTalk_Settings_Api_BaseUrlInfo: If you provide only the base (e.g., http://localhost:1234), /v1/chat/completions will be added automatically. If you enter the full path, it will be used exactly as entered.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.ContextFilterDescriptio: Select what details about pawns and their environment should be sent as context for dialogue generation.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.ContextFilterTip: Tip: More isn't always better. Too much information can make the AI get distracted or stuck on irrelevant details.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.Preset.Essential.Desc: Optimized for local LLMs - minimal token usage
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.Preset.Standard.Desc: Balanced for cloud LLMs - moderate detail
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.Preset.Comprehensive.De: Maximum detail for capable LLMs - high token usage
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.EnableContextOptimizati: Optimize context to minimize token usage while preserving essential information.\nNote: This may reduce the quality of generated dialogue.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.ConversationHistoryCoun: Each session contains multiple dialogue turns, which can significantly increase token count
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.MaxPawnContextCount: Maximum Number of Pawns to Include
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.MaxPawnContextCount.Too: Controls the maximum number of pawns that can participate in a conversation
LanguageData.RimTalk.DebugWindow.TooltipSelectForDeta: Select a row to view details
LanguageData.RimTalk.DebugWindow.SelectRowHint: Select a request on the left to inspect Prompt/Response/Contexts.
LanguageData.RimTalk.DebugWindow.ResendTooltip: Edit context and prompt, then resend to test dialogue.
LanguageData.RimTalk.DebugWindow.ResendError: AI is currently busy. Retry when status is Idle.
LanguageData.RimTalk.DebugWindow.FailMsg: Request failed. Click "API Log" to generate a log for support.
LanguageData.RimTalk.FloatMenu.WhatToSayToSelf: What do you want to say to {0}?
LanguageData.RimTalk.FloatMenu.WhatToSayToOther: What do you want {0} to say to {1}?
LanguageData.RimTalk.MustacheVar.pawn.name: Short name
LanguageData.RimTalk.MustacheVar.pawn2.name: Pawn 2's short name
LanguageData.RimTalk.MustacheVar.pawn3.name: Pawn 3's short name
LanguageData.RimTalk.MustacheVar.section.name: Current pawn's name (inside section)
LanguageData.RimTalk.MustacheVar.dialogue: Full decorated prompt (time, weather, location, etc.)
LanguageData.RimTalk.MustacheVar.colony.name: Colony name
LanguageData.RimTalk.MustacheVar.json.format: JSON output format (dynamic based on settings)
